name: Omega Labyrinth Life
overview: The Bellefleurs Girls’ Academy has an extremely large and beautiful garden. There was a certain legend in this large garden. It is said that beautiful flowers will continue to bloom for eternity due to the miraculous power emitted by the holy flower “Flora” that blooms in its center. At this school attended by ultra high-class girls, the first transfer student since its founding had arrived. Her name is Hinata Akatsuki.
